name: ts-results
description: A typescript implementation of Rust's Result and Option objects.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:ts: npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json -m esnext --outDir dist/esm/ -d false -declarationMap false
scripts.build:copy: copyfiles README.md LICENSE src/package.json dist --flat && copyfiles src/rxjs-operators/package.json dist --up 1
